name: @marioslab/ulang
description: Virtual machine & assembler for recreational programming like it's 1992.

scripts.clean: rm -rf vm/dist && rm -f vm/src/ulang.* && rm -f vm/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -rf client/assets/bundle && rm -rf server/build
scripts.minify: esbuild --minify vm/dist/iife/ulang.js --outfile=vm/dist/iife/ulang.min.js && esbuild --allow-overwrite --minify client/assets/bundle/index.js --outfile=client/assets/bundle/index.js && esbuild --allow-overwrite --minify client/assets/bundle/editor.worker.js --outfile=client/assets/bundle/editor.worker.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:wasm && npm run build:modules && npm run build:vm && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run minify
scripts.dev: npm run build:wasm && concurrently "npm run dev:wasm" "npm run dev:vm" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server"

author: Mario Zechner
